name: Caverns of the Molten God
description:
CAN YOU HEAR US, SKY HUNTER?

WE WISH TO EXPLORE YOUR SOLITARY MIND

Caverns of the Molten God is a metroidva...wait, come back!

Caverns of the Molten God is an exploration platformer with gameplay inspired by Metroid and the classic arcade game Joust. Explore the caverns and uncover the secret of why you're here and what the Molten God has in store for you.

Featuring:

An interconnected world filled with challenging precision platforming

Passable developer graphics

An original 8-bit soundtrack

Keyboard and Gamepad support

Hidden secrets giving you access to the mind of the Molten God

This short demo contains the first world of the game. Don't feel the urge to quit after you've defeated the first boss - there's more to explore!
